sourcesContent:
import { FormControl, Input, Checkbox,FormControlLabel, Button} from '@mui/material'
import { Box } from '@mui/system'
import React from 'react'

const SectionBanner2 = () => {
  return (
    <Box>
      <Box component='form' sx={{display:'flex', flexDirection:'column'}}>
        <FormControl>
          <Input type='email' placeholder='Introduce tu mail' />
        </FormControl>
        <FormControlLabel
          label="Deseo recibir notificaciones por email"
          control={<Checkbox color='success'/>}/>
          <Button sx={{ variant:'outlined', textTransform:'uppercase'}}>subscribirse</Button>

      </Box>

    </Box>
  )
}

export default SectionBanner2
